1.name: Goblin
1.defeatMessage: The Goblin screeches and scurries away into the shadows...

1.name: Slime
1.defeatMessage: The Slime jiggles violently before melting into the ground...

1.name: Wild Bat
1.defeatMessage: The Wild Bat screeches one last time before falling from the sky...

2.name: Orc
2.defeatMessage: The Orc drops her weapon with a grunt and collapses in defeat...

2.name: Skeleton
2.defeatMessage: The Skeleton crumbles into a pile of brittle bones...
